scripts.server: cd sdc-form-manager && cd server && npm run start
scripts.client: cd sdc-form-manager && cd client && npm run start
scripts.build: cd sdc-form-manager && npx tsc && cd client && npm run build
scripts.iall: npm i && cd client && npm i && cd .. && cd server && npm i
scripts.test: cd sdc-form-manager && cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test
